-title: "exporting_tables_from_models"

date: "2024-12-10"
output: html_document
---















```{r}
#loading in all necessary packages

library(here) 
library(ggplot2) 
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(DHARMa)
library(gtable)
library(gt)

```


```{r}
#code to convert m/s to cm/s

meanvel_data_raw <- read.csv("./tables/mean_vel.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)


meanvel_data_clean <- meanvel_data_raw %>%
  mutate(
    mean_cms = mean * 100,
    se_cms = se * 100
  )%>%
   dplyr::select(-mean, -se)


binomial_table_data <- read.csv("./tables/binom_table.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

velocitymodel <- read.csv("./tables/excel_velocity.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

lucabinom <- read.csv("./tables/binom_excel.csv")
```


```{r}
#velcoity table 
vel_table <- meanvel_data_clean %>%
  gt() %>%

  cols_label(
    temp_grp = "Trial Group (Â°C)",  
    mean_cms = "Mean Velocity (cm/s)",          
    se_cms = "Standard Error (cm/s)"            
  ) %>%
 
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_body()
  ) %>%

  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  )

vel_table

gtsave(vel_table, "./tables/mean_vel_tale.png")

```


```{r}
#velocity model

velocitym_table <- velocitymodel %>%
  gt() %>%
  cols_label(
    interaction_of = "Interaction of...",  
    estimate_se = "Estimate +/- SE",          
    z_value = "Z Value",
    pr = "Pr(>|z|)",
    df = "Df"
  ) %>%

  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_body()
  ) %>%

  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  )
velocitym_table

gtsave(velocitym_table, "./tables/velocity_m_table.png")

```

```{r}
#luca binom table 
model2binom_table <- lucabinom %>%
  gt() %>%
  cols_label(
    interaction = "Interaction of...",  
    estimate = "Estimate +/- SE",          
    z_value = "Z Value",
    pr = "Pr(>|z|)",
    df = "Df"
  ) %>%

  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_body()
  ) %>%

  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(align = "left"),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  )
model2binom_table

gtsave(velocitym_table, "./tables/model2binom_table.png")

```
